# ðŸ”— shortURL

[[English](README_EN.md) | [French](README.md)]

A simple and effective open-source URL shortener, built with Python and Flask. Simply shorten your links, without redirecting to advertising or third-party services.

## Prerequisites

*Python 3.x
* Docker (optional)

## Installation

### Locally

1. Clone the repository:```bash
    git clone https://github.com/Albatros329/shortURL.git
    cd shortURL
    ```2. Install dependencies:```bash
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    ```3. Launch the application:```bash
    python app.py
    ```The application will be accessible at `http://localhost:8080`.

### With Docker (recommended)

1. Make sure Docker is installed.

2. Upload the image:```bash
    docker pull ghcr.io/albatros329/shorturl:latest
    ```3. Launch the container:```bash
    docker run -d -p 8080:8080 -e BASEURL=http://localhost:8080/ ghcr.io/albatros329/shorturl:latest
    # Veuillez ajuster la variable BASEURL selon votre nom de domaine.
    ```## Configuration

You can configure the base URL of the application via an environment variable, especially useful when deploying with Docker.

| Varies | Description | Default |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `BASEURL` | The base URL used to generate shortened links. | `http://localhost:8080/` |
| `SECRET_KEY` | Secret key for session security and CSRF. | Randomly generated (non-persistent) |
